title: LF flex 5 man
body:
Currently gold 3 and climbing fast in flex gaining around 25-30lp a win and only lose 10-15lp a loss. 
Looking for people around plat in flex same in solo/duo or higher
also currently diamond in solo/duo 
i aim to win and wanting to climb faster while 5  manning making friendships along the way 
Happy to have more then 5 people so the first 5 that gets on ill invite.

(SUP MAIN)
